mapper.select: /* AdmBizPrvtMapper.selectBizPrvtListCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1
/* AdmBizPrvtMapper.selectBizPrvtList */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
/* AdmBizPrvtMapper.selectBizPrvtHistList */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
/* AdmBizPrvtMapper.selectBizPrvtExcel */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
